headline: DTE Energy announces an additional $100 million investment to rebuild the electric grid; part of DTE's commitment to reduce outage frequency by 30% and cut restoration time in half by 2029
summary: •New investments to improve electric reliability include the construction of three electric substations and new, updated equipment to deliver power from these substations to customers’ homes and businesses Construction at Sigma substation Substation construction in Shelby Township, Mich. Detroit, Nov. 18, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- DTE Energy (NYSE:DTE) today announced the construction of three new electric substations as part of the company’s ongoing commitment to reducing power outage frequency
